title: Securing Your Software Supply Chain with Sigstore (LFS182)
overview: This course introduces the concepts of software signing and verification using Sigstore. Participants will learn how to secure their software supply chain through identity-based signing, verification, and transparency logs with tools like Cosign, Rekor, and Fulcio.
requirements: Basic experience with the Linux command line
audience: This course is ideal for developers, DevOps engineers, security professionals, and system administrators who want to enhance the security of their software supply chain using open source tools.

details.certificate: Certificate of Completion and Digital Badge
